channel.title: Need Help With Something!
channel.description:
Hello,
I wanted to add something to donator zone that half is pvp other half is safe how can i add that?
Thx :D

item.title: Need Help With Something!
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:8, topic:372503”]Well we can only guess due to the fact that people ask for help and never give exact details on what they want.

Be specific![/quote]

Well, those who post in the help section, do deserve help, however, research helps before asking for help. And are we going to have the link thing all night?

Boolean

item.title: Need Help With Something!
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:6, topic:372503”][quote author=Vince, link=topic=468554.msg3425541#msg3425541 date=1291885521]
Why would you look through a server to provide a simple boolean… And it can be done in MANY ways.
[/quote]

Most people in the help section dont know wth a boolean is. Most of the time its just easier to explain the code them on what it does and what they need to do. I know it can be done in many ways.[/quote]

From the looks of it, he probably only has features such as donor advantages, never considering the “place” of where everything is handled, such as allowed in, out, wild, safe.

Read full topic

There’s really no code… Just provide an example boolean for him.
[/quote]

I really dont bother wasting my time looking through rs2 servers, if people provide some snippets its easier for me to point them in the right direction Obviously its a boolean and thats how it has always been done.[/quote]

Why would you look through a server to provide a simple boolean… And it can be done in MANY ways.

item.title: Need Help With Something!
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

IlikeArrays:

Provide your current donator zone code.

There’s really no code… Just provide an example boolean for him.

public boolean vipWild() { if ((absX >= 1234 && absX <= 4321 && absY >= 5678 && absY <= 8765)) return true; else return false; }
